name: European Services Strategy Unit
membership: Work with networks but not specifically a member.
goal:
High quality rigorous research, analysis and evaluation.

Evidence-based policies.

Strategies and best practice to meet public service objectives.

Improving democratic accountability, participation and transparency.

Commitment to public service principles, equalities and social justice.

Training and development to build capacity.

Jointly agreed work programmes with organisations.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Public sector policies including Public Private Partnerships
